-- This script will create the tables needed to load the NYC taxi data

-- #############################################################################
-- DON'T FORGET TO CHOOSE THE CORRECT SQL POOL AND THE CORRECT DATABASE
-- #############################################################################

-- -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- Create API Analytics schema 'nyc'
-- -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.schemas WHERE name = 'nyc')
    EXEC('CREATE SCHEMA [nyc]');
GO

-- -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- Create tables
-- -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- Create Customers Table
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE NAME = 'configDataDownload' AND TYPE = 'U')
	DROP TABLE nyc.dataDconfigDataDownloadownload
GO
CREATE TABLE nyc.configDataDownload (
	url nvarchar(256) NOT NULL,
	filename nvarchar(256) NOT NULL,
    filepath nvarchar(256) NOT NULL,
    downloaded BIT NOT NULL
)
WITH (
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	HEAP
)
GO
CREATE INDEX IX_configDataDownload_url_downloaded ON nyc.configDataDownload(url, downloaded);
GO
ALTER TABLE nyc.configDataDownload ADD CONSTRAINT DF_configDataDownload_download DEFAULT 0 FOR downloaded;
GO
